articles.title: Airbus provides 2024 guidance update - Airbus
articles.description: Airbus SE is providing a market update to report on new developments related to its space activities and commercial aircraft business, the impact of which is leading the Company to update its 2024 guidance.
articles.content:
• Charges of around 0.9bn reported on certain telecommunications, navigation and observation space programmes

articles.author: Kane Wu, Julie Zhu
articles.title: Fast fashion retailer Shein filed for London listing in early June - Reuters
articles.description: Shein confidentially filed papers with Britain's markets regulator in early June, two sources said, kicking off the process for a potential London listing by the online fast-fashion retailer later in the year.
